testcase.name: TC_01 Register with valid username and email address
testcase.system-out: Given User goes to homepage.................................................passed When Click "register" button................................................passed Then Enter valid username "mervemermer2023" with letters and numbers........passed And Enter valid email address "mervemermer@gmail.com".......................passed

testcase.name: TC_03 Register fails if username is blank
testcase.system-out: Given User goes to homepage.................................................passed When Click "register" button................................................passed Then Leave username box blank...............................................passed And Enter valid email address "mervemermer@gmail.com".......................passed And Assert that username is not accepted....................................passed
